title: Captain America - Steve Gerber
description:
Captain America and Steve Gerber? Yes, it&#039;s true, with unusual results.
First issue is 157 with Gerber being listed as a co-author with Englehart.
Then begins a short run of 221, 222, 223, and 225. I&#039;ve omitted 244 because Gerber didn&#039;t write it and missing it doesn&#039;t cause any problems.

These come near the end of his first stint with Marvel. Perhaps there&#039;s some tension being displayed by having Gerber listed in issue 225 as the &#039;typist&#039; instead of the writer.

I&#039;ve included issue 226 even though Gerber didn&#039;t write it because 225 ends in such a cliff-hanger.

As always, thanks to the original uploaders. I took these from a huge Captain America torrent containing hundreds of issues. Pdf files.
